Taking Sarah's sister with them who's fondly known as 'Auntie' Kath, this extended family have dreams of livestock farming and a more self-sufficient lifestyle

programme.title: Killer at the Crime Scene
programme.desc: Forensic teams investigate the murder of a teenage girl in her own home, and discover that the killer has attempted to cover their tracks by making it look like suicide

programme.title: The Philpott Fire: What Happened Next
programme.desc: A look at events surrounding the arson attack by Mick and Mairead Philpott on their Derby home, which lead to the deaths of six of their children. Through interviews with friends and family, their bizarre motive is laid bare, and the programme examines how locals are still reeling from the senseless loss of lives

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis follows a Flying Squad investigation into a ruthless gang who blew apart 27 ATMs in and around the city of London

programme.title: The LeoVegas Live Casino Show
programme.desc: Interactive gambling

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: World's Busiest Train Stations
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at Zurich Hauptbahnhof, which is the busiest railway hub in Europe and also one of the most punctual, with 90 per cent of its 3,000 trains a day running on time. In the control room, Mario has to react when a cargo of sausages spills onto the mainline, blocking commuter services and Germany-bound trains. Transport police officer Virginia heads out to respond to a late-night emergency when a brawl breaks out at a nearby station after an outdoor party is cancelled at the last moment

programme.title: World's Busiest Train Stations
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at Howrah Terminal in Calcutta, which is the busiest station in India and serves one of the fastest growing cities on Earth. Monday morning rush hour sees ticket inspector Pranab braving a tide of morning commuters pouring out from the platforms as he seeks out fare dodgers, while a signal failure halts the progress of the most prestigious service on the entire Indian network in the form of the Rajdhani Express, the luxury overnight train from Calcutta to Delhi

programme.title: The Railways That Built Britain with Chris Tarrant
programme.desc: The broadcaster examines the role of the railways during the two global conflicts of the 20th century, keeping vital supply lines open and transporting troops to and from the front. In the First World War, railway works were converted into munitions factories and women were employed for these dangerous jobs and their heroic efforts helped win them the vote, while in the Second World War, they were vital in organising the evacuation of a million children and offered underground shelters from air raids

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The Kangaroos take Peppa and her family to the beach on their second day in Australia, where they try surfing for the first time

programme.title: At Gunpoint (1955)
programme.desc: A peaceable shopkeeper becomes a local hero when he accidentally kills the leader of a gang of bank robbers. However, when the dead bandit's partners in crime come looking for retribution, he finds the friends and neighbours who praised his bravery are now about to abandon him. Western, starring Fred MacMurray, Dorothy Malone and Walter Brennan

programme.title: Santa Fe Passage (1955)
programme.desc: A wagon scout accused of collusion with Apaches is given a chance to redeem himself when he is hired to transport a shipment of arms to Santa Fe. The owner of the valuable freight happens to be a mixed-race woman and at first he shows her only disrespect, but has to overcome his prejudice when he finds himself falling for her. Western adventure, with John Payne, Faith Domergue and Slim Pickens

programme.title: Apache Uprising (1965)
programme.desc: Western, starring Rory Calhoun as a tough-talking cowboy with a heart of gold who bravely defends fellow stagecoach passengers from a potentially lethal Indian attack. Also starring Corinne Calvet, Lon Chaney Jr and John Russell

programme.title: Picnic (1955)
programme.desc: A drifter turns up in a small American town looking for a well-off old friend in the hope of borrowing money. However, he causes nothing but trouble for the locals, seducing both his old pal's fiancee and a local schoolteacher. Drama based on William Inge's Pulitzer Prize-winning play, starring William Holden, Cliff Robertson and Kim Novak

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra (2009)
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: The Equalizer (2014)
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: Call Me by Your Name (2017)
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Elio spends his lazy summers at his family's Italian villa, where his academic father welcomes research assistant Oliver to help with his work on Greco-Roman culture. Before long Elio and Oliver grow close, leading to a summer that will alter both of their lives for ever. Director Luca Guadagnino's Oscar and Bafta-winning romantic drama, based on the novel by André Aciman, starring Armie Hammer, Timothee Chalamet and Michael Stuhlbarg

programme.title: Menashe (2017)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of New York's notoriously secretive Hasidic Jewish community, grocery store clerk Menashe struggles against tradition to keep custody of his only son after his wife passes away. Drama, starring Menashe Lustig. In Yiddish

programme.title: Ice Cold in Alex (1958)
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Leading the trek is an alcoholic army captain, who vows to remain sober until he has completed the task - but his resolve is threatened by a stranger they rescue who is secretly an enemy spy. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews

programme.title: We're No Angels (1955)
programme.desc: Three convicts escape from the penal colony on notorious Devil's Island and seize a French family's shop - only to find themselves helping the storekeeper outwit his scheming relatives. Comedy, starring Humphrey Bogart, Peter Ustinov, Aldo Ray and Basil Rathbone

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny (1954)
programme.desc: US Navy officers rebel against their ship's erratic captain during a violent storm at sea, only to face a court martial back on dry land. However, the crew's actions seem to have been justified when evidence questioning the mental stability of their superior is produced. Second World War drama based on Herman Wouk's novel, starring Humphrey Bogart, Jose Ferrer, Fred MacMurray and Van Johnson

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse (2016)
programme.desc: The mutant heroes face the oldest and most powerful of their kind, an ancient Egyptian tyrant who is restored to life in the 1980s and plans to destroy civilisation and rebuild it in his own image. Awakening after thousands of years, he recruits the disheartened Magneto and other mutants to create a new world order. As the fate of Earth hangs in the balance, Professor X and Raven lead a team of young X-Men to stop their seemingly invincible nemesis from destroying mankind. Superhero adventure sequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence and Oscar Isaac

programme.title: The Equalizer 2 (2018)
programme.desc: Robert McCall divides his time between cab driving and looking after a young man who is mixing with a bad crowd. When a CIA friend is murdered, the former black ops agent sets out to avenge her death, and winds up fighting for survival in his hurricane-battered home town. Action thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal and Ashton Sanders

programme.title: Trading Places (1983)
programme.desc: Two billionaire brothers engineer the downfall of a high-flying stockbroker, while giving a homeless conman all the advantages of wealth, as part of a bet to see whether heredity or upbringing determines character. Comedy, starring Dan Aykroyd, Eddie Murphy, Jamie Lee Curtis, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Girls Trip (2017)
programme.desc: A lifestyle guru is offered the chance to be a keynote speaker at a music festival in New Orleans. She decides to invite three old friends she has drifted apart from, hoping to turn a working weekend into a wild vacation and a chance to rebuild their bonds. After a confrontation gets them kicked out of their hotel, they hit the streets of the Big Easy and reconnect with their wild sides. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.title: All the King's Men (1949)
programme.desc: A small-town senator wins popular support by railing against the corruption of the political establishment and vowing to defend the interests of ordinary working people. However, once in office, he succumbs to greed as readily as those he once so virulently condemned. Political drama, starring Broderick Crawford, Joanne Dru, John Ireland and Mercedes McCambridge

programme.title: Winchester '73 (1950)
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his father's killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally

programme.title: Ten Wanted Men (1955)
programme.desc: A law-abiding Arizona rancher runs into trouble when he unwittingly makes an enemy of a neighbouring landowner, who resents him for having befriended and comforted his abused mistress. The jealous man then recruits nine gunmen in a bid to drive his rival out of the territory. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Richard Boone, Donna Martell and Jocelyn Brando

programme.title: O.S.S. (1946)
programme.desc: A spy is parachuted into France shortly before D-Day to complete a perilous top-secret mission. His team of expert operatives includes a strong-minded female agent - but sparks fly when the pair begin to work together, a situation which looks likely to lead to a crisis of conscience. Second World War adventure, starring Alan Ladd, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Patric Knowles and Richard Benedict

programme.title: Hampstead (2017)
programme.desc: Bored American widow Emily becomes involved with Donald, a gruff Irish loner living wild on Hampstead Heath, even though the worlds they inhabit could not be more different. When his home is threatened by greedy real estate developers, she believes she has found her new cause - but gets more than she bargained for when unexpected romance blossoms. Romantic comedy drama, starring Brendan Gleeson, Diane Keaton and James Norton

programme.title: Hitman (2007)
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin, who exists at the beck and call of a mysterious organisation, fails in his latest mission, and becomes a target himself, as security forces worldwide become aware of his existence and a rival agent is assigned to tie up loose ends. Action thriller, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko

programme.title: The Mustang (2019)
programme.desc: Roman Coleman, a violent inmate at a maximum-security prison in Nevada, is given the chance to participate in a rehabilitation therapy programme involving the training of wild mustangs. Director Laure de Clermont-Tonnerre's drama, starring Matthias Schoenaerts, Jason Mitchell and Bruce Dern

programme.title: A Most Wanted Man (2014)
programme.desc: An immigrant to Hamburg who has previously suffered torture tries to lay a claim to an inheritance from his father. His story attracts the attention of American and German intelligence agencies, who try to determine his identity as suspicions grow that he is a dangerous extremist. Thriller based on John le Carre's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Rachel McAdams and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: When a furious Sienna bans Warren from seeing the twins until the file against them is closed, Joel questions whether a normal family can exist with such a battered history

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Peri decides to surprise her girlfriend Juliet with a trip to Brighton. Meanwhile, Norma's devious plan is set into motion, starting with breaking and entering

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in to Murphy's Historic Hotel near Sacramento in northern California, where owners Brian, Kevin and Joel are often too distracted by their lively bar to look after their business. The national landmark, which has played host to an array of famous names including Mark Twain, President Ulysses S Grant and JP Morgan, has no dedicated accommodation manager, so guests sometimes struggle to receive the attention they need and end up feeling the hotel has become an afterthought beside the noisy saloon

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in to Connecticut's oldest inn, the Curtis House in Woodbury, which has been owned by the Hardisty family for generations. However, the business has started to fall apart and their legacy is on the brink of being lost. Siblings Chris and TJ, who are in charge, no longer speak to each other and the staff and guests feel stuck in the middle

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: The final two weddings take place, with 41-year-old single mum Melissa being partnered with Disney-loving dad-of-two Josh, and Melinda matched with fellow business mogul Layton

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After more than five years of dating, Sheldon and Amy spend their first night together, while Leonard, Howard and Raj must decide who will take their extra Star Wars movie ticket. Plus, Sheldon's Obi-Wan advises him on his difficult relationship decisions. Starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with recurring guest star Bob Newhart

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil tries to share his love of dancing with unenthusiastic son Luke and Claire struggles to hide her frustration while teaching an overly cautious Alex to drive. Mitch and Cam enter the cut-throat world of wedding venue booking

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Gloria settles a score with another mum during a school visit, Mitch sets out to prove he is more environmentally aware than his neighbour, Manny and Luke have a double date with twins, and Alex goes to see a therapist. Jesse Eisenberg and Jane Krakowski guest star

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: For his first task back in the field, Jeffords prepares to join Peralta and Boyle on a mission to infiltrate a gym where steroids are being sold illegally, but Peralta begins to have second thoughts about whether the sergeant is ready. Meanwhile, Santiago and Diaz try to determine who has burgled Gin's flat

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: While investigating a string of hotel robberies together, Peralta is upset to discover Santiago is considering leaving the precinct to work with his rival, the Vulture, in the special crimes unit. Holt and Jeffords try to think up some strategies to make the team more efficient. Featuring a guest appearance by Adam Sandler

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj's parents set him up on a blind date in the hope of initiating an arranged marriage, but after a promising start it becomes apparent that the girl in question is more interested in Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny begins her new job as a bartender. Starring Kunal Nayyar and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon receive an invitation to present their research to a physics conference, but Sheldon's reluctance to pander to his peers causes conflict between the friends. An intervention by Penny makes matters worse. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: On a weekend cabin trip with Penny and Amy, Sheldon spills one of Leonard's secrets, while Howard and Bernadette must draw a line when Raj goes overboard with pregnancy gifts. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon disagree over whether to continue holding their regular Roommate Agreement meetings, with Leonard suggesting they are no longer required, while Sheldon believes they are still essential. As the pair's squabble quickly escalates into a full-blown argument, the rest of their friends turn up for a planned Game of Thrones viewing party, and end up taking sides in the dispute - resulting in two warring factions taking up residence in 4A and 4B. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The gang members get together to have their family photo taken, with Gloria on hand to organise everyone. and Phil tracks down the record he lost his virginity to, but soon regrets it when it makes him feel as if he's being unfaithful to Claire. She, meanwhile, accuses Cameron of being a snob when he refuses her daughter's hand-me-downs, and Jay enters Stella into a dog show

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitch and Cam worry about the growing cost of their wedding, so they agree to each sell a prized possession to earn some extra cash. Jay, Gloria and Manny challenge one another to step outside their comfort zones, involving traditional sausages, pickle and Stella's belly, while the Dunphy kids are in a mischievous mood after finding an old answering machine recording of Claire breaking the news that she's pregnant

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Captain Holt is taken by surprise when his long-time nemesis, Deputy Chief Madeline Wuntch (guest star Kyra Sedgwick), arrives to carry out an inspection of his precinct. Peralta and Jeffords test the boundaries between 'work friendship' and 'real friendship' while they investigate a stabbing at a trendy milk bar. Boyle searches for a guest to take to his ex-wife's engagement party - will Diaz come to the rescue?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The squad has time to kill when the arrival of the Serbian president's motorcade to Brooklyn is delayed, so Peralta launches the seventh annual Jimmy Jab Games, an eccentric series of races and contests held in the precinct building. Meanwhile, Jeffords and Holt must set up a new drug task force approved by Holt's nemesis, Madeline Wuntch

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes upset about his career, the destruction of the comic-book store and Leonard and Penny's future living arrangements. Elsewhere, Howard is unable to keep hold of a carer for his mother. Comedy, staring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Amy are forced to take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon after his epic railway journey ends in chaos. Meanwhile, Howard finds Stuart's relationship with his mother strange, and Penny has an interview for a sales job at Bernadette's workplace. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon finds himself forced to keep a secret when Penny decides to tell him what happened on her disappointing first date with Leonard. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is dejected to see Penny with another man and decides to cut his losses by going back to fellow scientist Leslie Winkle - a move that upsets Sheldon. Starring Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Sara Gilbert

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Juliet, Peri and Danny Beard wake up in Brighton with fierce hangovers and start their journey back to Hollyoaks village. Ste and James have a big question to ask Sienna and Romeo

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Tensions are high as the couples attend their first Dinner Party of the series, and Claire's attempt to reconcile with Jesse is met with hostility

programme.title: Fred's Last Resort
programme.desc: Fred Sirieix challenges a group of youngsters at a crossroads in their lives to run a luxury, five-star hotel in the south of France. Across a stressful summer season, the contestants compete in a variety of demanding challenges, exposing them to all that the land of lavish luxury has to offer, as well as the exacting standards expected of those serving the super-rich. At the end of the series, one person will win a life-changing job for an international hotel group

programme.title: Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins USA
programme.desc: The celebrity recruits learn a valuable lesson in using fear to inform and help, rather than allowing it to overpower their thoughts, with a pole-crossing challenge and a fire run

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Dating show in which singletons meet up with possible partners at a restaurant, hoping to find love. Each person has chosen their date based solely on an internet photograph, and at the end of the meal, they decide whether they want to take things further. Best friends Ben and Ross from Bournemouth, Dorset, arrive together for their dates with Lucy and Regan, while Paul worries about his stutter as he greets Kathryn

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Tensions are high as the couples attend their first Dinner Party of the series, and Claire's attempt to reconcile with Jesse is met with hostility

programme.title: Fred's Last Resort
programme.desc: Fred Sirieix challenges a group of youngsters at a crossroads in their lives to run a luxury, five-star hotel in the south of France. Across a stressful summer season, the contestants compete in a variety of demanding challenges, exposing them to all that the land of lavish luxury has to offer, as well as the exacting standards expected of those serving the super-rich. At the end of the series, one person will win a life-changing job for an international hotel group

programme.title: Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins USA
programme.desc: The celebrity recruits learn a valuable lesson in using fear to inform and help, rather than allowing it to overpower their thoughts, with a pole-crossing challenge and a fire run

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang goes to a bar and runs into Penny's old boyfriend Zack, while Bernadette is left to spend the evening with Sheldon when she cannot go wine tasting with the others. Elsewhere, things do not go to plan when Raj introduces his new girlfriend, Claire. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: While Barry's love of Animal House fails to impress an elite fraternity, Beverly tries convincing Murray to take up new hobbies

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica attempts to fool Beverly into thinking a parents weekend has been rescheduled. Meanwhile, Adam joins the school production of Romeo and Juliet

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Peri decides to surprise her girlfriend Juliet with a trip to Brighton. Meanwhile, Norma's devious plan is set into motion, starting with breaking and entering

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Newly reunited couple Juliet and Peri escape to Brighton and share a special moment on Brighton beach, before meeting Ru Paul's Drag Race UK winner Danny Beard

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Pipestone, Minnesota, where he checks in to Historic Calumet Inn. Joint owners Vanda and Rina Smrkovski were given the hotel as a gift by their father, but after just nine months in charge, their staff are on the brink of revolt, and guests are expressing their dissatisfaction with the accommodation. Gordon quickly realises the sisters need to grow up fast if he's going to have a chance of saving the business

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Angler's Lodge in Island Park, Idaho. Owner Dave Eby built the lodge with his own hands, but a family tragedy has caused him and wife Dede to shy away from the hotel and the community. Gordon is desperate to help mend this broken family - but is it too late to save their business?

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: Tensions are high as the couples attend their first Dinner Party of the series, and Claire's attempt to reconcile with Jesse is met with hostility

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After being forced to deal with a sick Sheldon, the rest of the gang try to treat themselves to a Sheldon-free weekend. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay is troubled when best pal Shorty reveals that he and his wife are moving away. Phil and Claire take Haley out to discuss her future, while Mitchell and Cam take a break from all the wedding planning to enjoy a romantic meal - only to interrupt a couple's surprise engagement dinner. Chazz Palminteri and Jennifer Tilly guest star

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire thinks Luke is up to no good with his friends, so she persuades a reluctant Phil into helping her spy on their son. Gloria is suspicious of Jay when he starts moaning amorously in his sleep and Mitch struggles to keep a secret from Cam

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Holt invites the entire squad to his house to celebrate his birthday, but Jeffords struggles to keep everyone in line, with Peralta and Santiago making a bad impression on their host's husband Kevin. Meanwhile, Boyle's love of food leads to a romantic connection with an older woman, and Diaz introduces Gina to some psychologists - who find her to be a fascinating subject

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Boyle's new girlfriend gives his self-confidence a boost, but Peralta is forced to intervene before his colleague gets too serious, too soon in the relationship. Meanwhile, Diaz and Santiago have trouble taking a costumed crimefighter seriously, and Holt faces a challenge to his leadership

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Leonard invent excuses to avoid having to attend Penny's performance in a production of the stage musical Rent, but maintaining the pretence makes matters increasingly complicated. Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star, with DJ Qualls

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon falls ill, and his friends decide to go to a Planet of the Apes movie marathon to keep their distance, knowing he will be in a terrible mood. However, an unsuspecting Penny offers to nurse him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang goes to a bar and runs into Penny's old boyfriend Zack, while Bernadette is left to spend the evening with Sheldon when she cannot go wine tasting with the others. Elsewhere, things do not go to plan when Raj introduces his new girlfriend, Claire. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon discovers a surprise screening of The Avengers is scheduled at a local cinema, complete with a Q&A session with the film's director, Joss Whedon. However, the event just happens to clash with time he'd planned to spend with Amy, so he decides to pay Stuart to be his subtitute for the afternoon while he and the other boys immerse themselves in Marvel superheroics. Meanwhile, Leonard's mother Beverly arrives in town for an extended visit, and Penny takes the opportunity to bond with her new mother-in-law - and to make up for not inviting her to the wedding. Comedy, guest starring Christine Baranski

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Emmy-winning comedy returns - as do Cameron and Mitchell, who are back from honeymoon and determined to keep the romance alive. Cameron, however, takes it just a little step too far. The Dunphys, meanwhile, have been enjoying a relaxing summer without smart-alec Alex, who is away on a trip - although she threatens to rock the boat after arriving home early - and Gloria shows a different side after arguing with Jay about the lack of effort he puts into his appearance

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay and Gloria celebrate their anniversary, but cannot decide on what kind of gift to give each other. Meanwhile, the Dunphys join Alex on her college tour and Phil, Luke and Haley find themselves in a mirrored waiting room with a button and a sign that says 'Do Not Push'. Comedy, starring Ed O'Neill and Julie Bowen

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: It's Halloween again, and this time Peralta bets Holt he can steal his treasured watch before midnight, enlisting criminal assistance to achieve his goal. Gina struggles to keep up with her college course, perform a full-time job and attend dance rehearsals - leading to problems both in and out of work

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: When an Internal Affairs investigator reveals there may be a mole in the precinct, Peralta and Holt must find out who it is before Deputy Chief Wuntch gets wind of the situation. Jeffords and Diaz visit a silent disco to uncover leads for their new drug task force

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is forced to teach a course at the university, and Howard surprises the gang when he decides to enrol on it. Meanwhile, Amy plays Penny and Bernadette off against each other while the tension brews over Penny's new job. Comedy, guest starring Regina King (Southland), with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny attempt to prove Sheldon wrong when he claims that he and Amy have a superior relationship. Meanwhile, Howard is nervous when Nasa asks him to throw the first pitch at a baseball game honouring National Space Day. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny becomes addicted to an online game based on the world of Conan the Barbarian. As her obsession intensifies, she begins to neglect her friends and seeks the company of the usually snide Sheldon, whom she continually pesters for advice. Starring Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Elated at being named one of People magazine's '30 to Watch Under 30', Raj makes a pass at Penny and becomes very arrogant, making it hard for Leonard to maintain a positive perspective on his friend's new-found confidence. Guest starring Charlie Sheen

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Peri breaks down to Nadira at the hospital, as the pair confide in one another. Warren goes to see Sienna to ask if he can take the twins on a day out to a safari park

programme.title: Married at First Sight Australia
programme.desc: The newly-wed move in together and face their first task - Confessions Week. Bronte and Harrison fall into another argument, and Caitlin and Shannon hit their first roadblock

programme.title: Fred's Last Resort
programme.desc: Fred sends his young hopefuls to Provence to learn about some of the hotel's top-end suppliers, and they must use what they have learned to organise an evening of fine dining

programme.title: Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins USA
programme.desc: The remaining recruits take on a chemical warfare challenge, and the celebrity contestants reveal their personal stories that led to them wanting to be part of the show

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Young and well-spoken Ed meets the equally inexperienced Purdey, who tries to hide her 'crazy' personality, while 23-year-old Essex boy Mark, who claims to have racked up 64 sexual partners despite still living with his parents, has the task of wooing Clare, who won't sleep with anyone until they have been together for four months. Plus, Paul returns to the restaurant after his stammer got the better of him during his first date to try his luck with a new potential partner

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows from late 2021, including I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, True Story, Miriam and Alan: Lost in Scotland, Tiger King 2, Close to Me and Inside Beverly Hills: The Land of the Rich and Famous. PC Phil Bridge is searching Trowbridge to find a 73-year-old woman who is in the latter stages of dementia and has disappeared while out shopping with her son

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A five-year-old is rushed into St George's struggling to breathe, and her mum reveals how she has spent months in Great Ormond Street Hospital after being diagnosed with a rare form of juvenile arthritis. Meanwhile, an 83-year-old man in a confused state arrives in A&E after falling over, and as doctors carry out tests and a CT scan, his wife helps them understand the reason behind his confusion. Plus, a twelve-year-old girl must be brave as she undergoes treatment for a nasty cut on her leg

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: A woman at the airport suffers a suspected miscarriage, but the paramedics sent to her aid have trouble getting her back to hospital due to heavy snowfall. Crews also battle through the roads to treat a woman semi-conscious in police custody with collapsed veins

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the popular quiz with guest captain Claudia Winkleman and Johnny Vegas going up against Jon Richardson and Reginald D Hunter. Sara Pascoe joins resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Mechanic Grant, 34, is rushed in after being crushed against a brick wall by his own car, which he was working on at the time. Doctors are concerned he has a serious pelvic injury and other internal wounds and work quickly to establish how severe they are. Meanwhile, 44-year-old Doug, who has a rare growth on his head and face which is prone to profuse bleeding, arrives in A&E, and 23-year-old cage fighter Charlie is treated in minor injuries for something in his eye

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty, Kate Quilton and Matt Tebbutt unveil more secrets about the world of mass-produced food. Jimmy heads to the US to find out how the big chunks in American ice-cream stay so crispy, Kate investigates a rise in olive oil prices and finds a disease wiping out olive trees in southern Italy, and Matt discovers why Bloody Marys are so popular on planes - and why airline food tastes very different at ground level

programme.title: Lazy Boy Garage
programme.desc: Tom Ford sets his heart on a Ford Fiesta Mk1 from Spain and convinces the others to splash the cash - but there's a surprise in store then the Lazy Boys see the car in person

programme.title: Lazy Boy Garage
programme.desc: Tom 'Wookie' Ford thinks sourcing a cool retro van that someone can use to sell coffee in is a no-brainer, and the boys find a Renault 4F6 - but can they make a profit at auction?

programme.title: Cop Car Workshop
programme.desc: Mick Sweetmore's team tries to fix a radio issue in a bid to keep the new pursuit cars on the tail of Merseyside's criminals. There's a surprise visit from the fleet's oldest member, and the bosses get dirty hands when things go wrong on the road

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. Police in Western Australia conduct a two-day drug-dealing operation that exposes one suspect's ownership of a large number of dogs in poor condition.

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. Australian officers track wanted offenders and bail jumpers, hear a young motorist's fanciful tale, and put out spot fires on the Hume Highway.

programme.title: Australian Ninja Warrior

programme.title: Rick Stein's Far Eastern Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef continues his exploration of the Far East's most diverse food cultures, travelling to Thailand where he meets one of his heroes, David Thompson, who has devoted himself to understanding Thai cuisine. He also takes a train to Phuket to learn the art of hot and sour tom yum goong, and visits Melaka to explore the Nyonya-style cooking

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. Australian police stop a speeding motorcyclist, are called to a car accident, and identify a man using stolen credit cards in Western Australia.

programme.title: Cop Car Workshop
programme.desc: Police officers request a new police support unit or riot van, while a stolen car chase ends with an X5 wedged in a hedge. Boss Mick Sweetmore goes back to the floor with Merseyside's mental health team and discovers another side to modern-day policing - as well as the poor state of the vehicle they are currently using

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May put three supercars through their paces in Italy. Their weapons of choice are the 691bhp Lamborghini Aventador, McLaren's hi-tech MP4-12C, and a British brute in the form of the Noble M600. The journey begins at Nardo, a high-speed testing ground so vast it can be seen from space, and includes a nerve-racking drive in Rome before reaching its conclusion with a timed challenge against the Stig at the Imola circuit

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May travel to Beijing to learn about China's car industry, which has seen great expansion in recent years - but also have a violent encounter with one of the Stig's cousins. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond immerses himself in the world of Nascar at a race in Texas, and the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG Roadster is wrestled around the test track, emitting serious amounts of noise and smoke in the process. Future host Matt LeBlanc is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Australian Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The second heat of Oz's take on the hit format features the Battle of the Tradies, the only husband-and-wife team, Queenslander larrikin mates and a former elite gymnast

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Time-conscious traveller Richard Ayoade is joined by actor Paul Rudd for a brisk romp round the Finnish capital. To get their bearings the pair head straight to the ladies toilet in the Torni hotel, which offers the best view of the city. They then go kayaking and snack on some reindeer jerky at the city's Hakaniemi market. Richard and Paul also visit not one, but two saunas - one of which can be found in a well-known burger chain. The duo also visit the wilderness island of Seurasaari, go foraging, and finish up in a sweet shop

programme.desc: Writer, actor, comedian and podcaster Adam Buxton accompanies Richard Ayoade on a voyage of discovery in Lisbon, the Portuguese capital city known for its decorative tiling and maritime history. Adam and Richard tackle it at break-neck speed in an electric rickshaw, visit a tinned-fish emporium, take the celebrated iron lift - the Elevador de Santa Justa - and listen to some fado, Lisbon's version of the blues. There's potent cherry liqueur for breakfast, a tram ride up a steep hillside and a trip to a doll hospital. The duo also pay a visit to Belem, home to Lisbon's famed custard tarts

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It's the last night in Rochdale, Greater Manchester, and the turn of feisty mum Sadiya Hussein to host. programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away

Using a budget of £400,000 Jasmine Harman goes all out flying the flag for north Devon, while Jonnie Irwin tempts them with some stunning properties in France

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lou and Tony dream of buying their own Spanish holiday home to enjoy with all their family. programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Laura and Leah Wright from Surrey have been enjoying holidays together in Spain since Leah was a child. programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: After years of working hard to make ends meet and putting up with the British weather, Jamie and Jayne Pace have decided to make a better life for themselves. programme.title: A New Life in the Sun

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Funeral service manager Peter Pickering hosts the second dinner party in Northamptonshire, hoping his traditional approach will win him the £1,000 cash prize. However, one guest does not like bread and butter pudding, and Stephanie is horrified by Jules's shocking revelation

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: As the third party from Northamptonshire gets under way, stay-at-home mum Stephanie Reeder's nerves are evident as she plans to serve classic fish and chips, while offering a glamorous clothes-swapping session for entertainment

programme.desc: Business planning manager Lauren Oxlade is the penultimate host in Northamptonshire. She reveals herself to be the dark horse of the competition when she invites a few surprising friends along to the party, and impresses with her organisational skills and passionate cooking style

programme.desc: Last to try his hand in Northamptonshire is managing director and proud northerner Carl Johnson, with a menu that includes gammon cooked in two litres of cola. Laura Hamilton pulls out all the stops to keep them in the UK with a budget of £125,000, while Jonnie Irwin does everything he can to impress Joan to buy in France with three charming properties for up to £65,000

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Property expert Ben Hillman shows Birmingham couple Stephen Topp and Christine Barratt five properties for their budget of £100,000 in Davenport, Florida. The pair love theme parks, so would love to find somewhere in close proximity to one

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Edinburgh couple David and Venus share a passion for Portugal, so would like a holiday home in the Algarve. Jasmine Harman lines up five properties for their £95,000 budget

programme.desc: Anthony is rushed to resus after coming off his motor scooter on his 18th birthday. Doctors are concerned that he has internal bleeding. After twisting his ankle at school, 13-year-old Josh has been brought to the emergency department by his father, Sanjay, who explains how he left India for the UK to pursue a career as a chef

programme.title: Paula
programme.desc: Part one of a two-part profile of Paula Yates, featuring never-before-heard audio interviews she recorded after the death of her partner Michael Hutchence in 1997. Part one focuses on Paula's rise to fame, her groundbreaking appearances on The Tube and the huge fame she and husband Bob Geldof experienced after the success of global charity Live Aid. With contributions from Terence Trent D'Arby, Robbie Williams, Nicky Clarke and Vanessa Feltz

programme.title: Paula
programme.desc: A look at Paula Yates's career as a writer, the importance of motherhood to her persona, the criticisms she faced and how she coped in the aftermath of Michael Hutchence's death. programme.title: Traffic Cops

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A runaway suspect puts Gary's life in danger, Scott and Adam discover a huge stash of drugs in the boot of a car, and officers are called to a New Year's Eve pub brawl. Plus, Ady catches a car thief, and five police vehicles are involved in a motorway chase

programme.title: Police Interceptors

programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the inner workings of one of the UK's most popular pub chains, shining a light on the secrets of the brand's success. programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: The officers deal with a number of uninsured drivers, including one who leads them on a 35-minute chase and another who flees the scene of a rush-hour crash, earning himself a full-scale investigation for his trouble. Then in Bradford, a crackdown on road offences leads to the officers nabbing another insurance avoider, but tensions run high as a result

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: It is estimated that more than a million vehicles in Britain are fitted with cloned number plates as criminals who switch them to pass by police cameras undetected. On the outskirts of Bradford, a suspected stolen car using cloned plates crashes after running a red light, leaving the occupants of another car with serious injuries, leaving officers to deal with the aftermath, while a manhunt is launched for the offenders

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of high-speed interception teams, this time with access to the officers of Cumbria's Roads Policing Unit. Glen has a busy night in Barrow-in-Furness dealing with a drunk and a runaway knifeman, and Colin detains a suspected drug dealer who has a wrap of heroin hidden in a very intimate place. Countryside and city collide when Duggie has to tackle a trailer full of cows that has overturned, blocking the main carriageway into Carlisle, while the alcohol-fuelled actions of one driver send officers rushing to evacuate villagers in the middle of the night after a crash ruptures a gas main

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A stick of dynamite causes chaos for Duggie when it is brought into Carlisle's main police station and the armed response unit is called out after there is a report of a gun being spotted in a city centre bar. Duncan receives a shock when a cyclist who has been trapped under a car turns out to be someone he knows, officers haul in a driver who is well over the limit and Hayley comes to the rescue when a teenager's car hits a wall during a late-night drive. Documentary following the work of Cumbria's Roads Policing Unit

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Ross and John put their armed-response training to the test when they tackle a suspected gunman, while teams are called out to deal with the results of dangerous driving after a person parks on a roundabout and a pedestrian is crushed under a car. Elsewhere, officers raid a cannabis farm, a Reliant Robin is bid a fiery farewell, and Phil finds out what happens when the driver of a Subaru Impreza decides to take on an HGV

programme.title: Car Pound Cops: Give Me My Car Back!
programme.desc: Following the dramatic work of recovery crews as they trace, track and tow vehicles driven illegally on Britain's roads. With access to two recovery companies, the series follows the action from the moment they are called in, to the trucks arriving on scene, and eventually towing the vehicle away to be impounded

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Home from the hospital, Felicity is tormented by memories of the car accident. John Palmer gives Mali the royal treatment, introducing him to the Summer Bay locals

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: With the computer system down, the staff resort to a whiteboard to keep track of everyone. Patients include an elderly man due to fly to Cyprus in two days, a former miner with breathing difficulties, a youngster with a footballing injury and a case of suspected meningitis. Plus, volunteer Jane Allen struggles when tasked with stashing a stationery delivery in the quiet room

programme.title: Road House (1989)

When he fires some of the establishment's corrupt staff, he incurs the wrath of a local crime boss who has a stranglehold on the town's businesses. Action thriller, starring Patrick Swayze, Ben Gazzara, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott and blues singer Jeff Healey

programme.title: Traffic Cops

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: On the A1 near Leeds, an intoxicated driver rams a police car before heading the wrong way down the dual carriageway and the cops instigate a risky containment manoeuvre to bring him to a standstill. programme.title: Police Interceptors

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Sgt Carlin arrests a gang of van thieves and uncovers a major criminal operation in the process, while a late-night compost thief is caught on his way out of the shower. programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Last-ever episode of the long-running crime drama. When Van Buren discovers a website featuring footage of an alarming amount of explosives, Lupo and Bernard race to find the anonymous blogger who filmed it before his plans to bomb a school are put into action. However, the Department of Education's refusal to take the threat seriously and resistance from the teachers' union complicate the investigation

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Logan uncover hidden motives when a paedophile is murdered on live TV by the father of one of his victims. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Christopher Noth

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Logan and Briscoe race to find the kidnapped son of a wealthy businessman who was is arrested while trying to exchange a ransom for the boy, and now threatens to interfere with the investigation

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the fatal stabbing of a taxi driver whose body was left under his vehicle. The finger of suspicion points to a man who took a drunken ride in the cab on the same night - an ex-convict who is also a gifted writer - and his protege, whose fingerprints were found on a book and cigar left at the scene. Saul Rubinek, JK Simmons and Sonia Braga guest star alongside Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A black minister raises the question of racial intolerance when a 12-year-old boy is killed in a hit-and-run in Harlem and the Jewish driver escapes punishment. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The family of a child who finds a gun suspected of being a murder weapon at a naval base comes under suspicion. The team sets out to discover who last used the firearm, with likely candidates including a petty criminal, a drug user, a Navy commander and a boy. Crime drama, starring Pauley Perrette and Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: CIA agent Trent Kort returns to track down dangerous criminal Jonathan Siravo and Gibbs is forced to put his personal feelings aside to assist in the investigation. The duo manage to get hold of Siravo's accountant, who agrees to reveal all he knows in exchange for full immunity, but the trail leads to an old man in a coma in what seems to be a case of stolen identity

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An army scientist goes missing, so Abby is asked to temporarily replace him on a top-secret research project - but Gibbs later learns her assignment is connected to a current murder investigation, and worries she may meet the same fate as her predecessor. Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette star

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As Amaro asks the SVU for help in clearing a convicted man's name, a figure from Benson's past enters her present

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A man involved in a bank heist is killed six months later in a deliberate explosion, and Nichols and Wheeler discover that one of his partners faked his own death. The detectives conclude that one of the robbers has decided not to split the money three ways, and may kill again to further increase their share. Crime drama, starring Jeff Goldblum and Julianne Nicholson

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cult leader is identified as the seducer of a 12-year-old girl who has been admitted to hospital with pregnancy-related complaints. However, the investigation is hindered by his followers' slavish devotion and refusal to co-operate with the team. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A college student files a claim of rape against her professor, but he insists they had consensual sex. Benson and Stabler weigh up the evidence and try to determine which of them is telling the truth - but over the course of their investigation they find themselves taking opposing sides. Drama, with Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A priest persuades Logan to reopen a decade-old murder case that pits him against an ambitious assistant district attorney, who is determined to keep the truth a secret. Detective drama, starring Chris Noth and Julianne Nicholson

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Leaving flowers at his mother's grave, Bobby discovers a picture that indicates an old enemy has returned. The case gets more complex when his brother is found dead and an old mentor survives a poison attack, making Bobby the prime suspect. Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Tony Goldwyn star

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: Red takes a gamble to find out if an underground court avenging miscarriages of justice is real or a myth. Chilling stories about its merciless eye-for-an-eye attitude have kept criminals and law enforcers alike on their toes, but when a missing prosecutor returns after a 12-year absence, Red is given the lead he needs to unravel the tale. Meanwhile, a mysterious woman makes Tom a tempting offer during a teachers' conference in Orlando. Guest starring Oscar winner Dianne Wiest

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A serial killer begins posting footage of his crimes online - and as the agents investigate, they realise that each film contains visual clues to the identity of the next victim. In a further bizarre twist, Abby later finds what seems to be a new video on her computer - and the case takes on fresh urgency with the discovery that it is actually a live feed, suggesting the murderer is somewhere on the premises

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bank at Quantico is robbed and a security guard killed, but the team soon discovers that stealing money may not have been the perpetrators' primary objective. Meanwhile, Gibbs is given the task of evaluating an inexperienced new agent assigned by Vance to help investigate the case. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Rey Valentin

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs sends DiNozzo and Ziva to retrieve top-secret information from a secure military base - a mission aimed at catching a mole in the NCIS ranks. Unfortunately, it soon becomes clear that the traitor is still at large - so the building is locked down and all agents are rounded up in a final effort to catch the culprit. Guest starring Jude Ciccolella

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A harmless tramp is attacked by an over-zealous vigilante and left for dead in a deserted alley, sending Briscoe and Logan in pursuit of his assailant. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Christopher Noth

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A famous rock star is acquitted of raping a fan after the victim's claims are rejected. Logan and Briscoe decide to investigate further, and discover the musician's pleasant reputation does not quite match his personality. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The discovery of a woman's body in the East River leads Briscoe and Green to investigate the drug-addicted brother of a famous footballer - and as the case unfolds, it becomes clear she may not have been the killer's only victim. Crime drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A tennis star is attacked in her locker room before a big tournament, and her wrist is broken during the incident. The sportswoman cannot give a description of her assailant, but the circumstances of the fray lead the detectives to suspect one of her competitors. Chris Noth stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green think they have got their man when the prime suspect in a murder investigation knows every detail about the killing. However, when he claims he acquired his information from a psychic vision, the detectives have their work cut out. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. When the body of a marine is found strung up at a construction site, the agents travel to LA to work with another NCIS team on an investigation into an international arms deal that escalates into a high-priority case, and Tony begins to pry into Ziva's life. Guest starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J (NCIS: Los Angeles)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Agent Callen poses as an arms trade contact in a bid to catch killer Michael Aaron Rivkin. Meanwhile, Tony fears Ziva may not be loyal to the team, and a psychologist uncovers the truth about the relationship between Gibbs and Agent Macy. With Chris O'Donnell, Louise Lombard and LL Cool J

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is forced to work alongside the FBI to catch the killer of an Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent who was murdered during a poker game at the Secretary of the Navy's mansion. Elsewhere, Tony takes on Rivkin in a confrontation that ends in one of them being shot

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A man convicted of the murder of his wife and daughter is released after 25 years in prison when Morgan recommends him for parole. The detective fears he has made the wrong decision when the ex-con is found at the scene of a crime three days later, but the team soon discovers he may have been innocent all along

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU investigates a series of murders where the victims were found with their hands dismembered and shells stuffed in their eyes and mouths. The killings lead the team to a father and son who practise a controversial religion, but when one of the suspects is kidnapped, the detectives are forced to rethink the case

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are called to investigate three violent sexual attacks against women. They enlist the aid of Dr Rebecca Hendrix, a policewoman-turned-psychiatrist, who helps them track down a suspect - but he turns out to be homosexual. Mariska Hargitay stars

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: During a surveillance operation, Fin stumbles on a robbery in a supermarket and almost loses his life. The incident results in him receiving unwelcome attention from the media, but also provides a chance to atone for past mistakes

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Munch becomes personally involved in the prosecution of a terminally ill embryologist who is accused of assisting a depressed woman in committing suicide. Evidence points overwhelmingly to her guilt - but the jury finds it hard to decide her fate. Hard-hitting police drama, guest starring Marlee Matlin

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the murder of an elderly woman who they learn was dying of cancer but had been determined to live out her final days to the full - a philosophy that encompassed dating a variety of men. Discovering her most recent gentleman callers all have alibis, they turn their attention to the murder weapon and realise they are looking for a serial killer. Anthony Rapp and Jane Krakowski guest star

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: Tom interrogates Jolene to find out exactly what she knows about him, and who is giving her orders. Red also feels uncomfortable when past associate Mako Tanida, a crimelord with a bone to pick - and one of the few people able to ruffle his feathers - escapes from prison

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Documentary showing how CCTV and other technological advances are helping to bring car thieves to justice. Suspected criminals in Chester are involved in a high-speed chase through the city centre, and there is footage that helped put an end to one of London's most prolific gangs. The programme also includes film of a getaway in which robbers tried to evade the law by driving at 180mph

Drama, with Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Cote de Pablo

Digging deeper, the team finds the dead man belonged to an underground fight club, and sets about discovering whether his involvement was a factor in the case. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, the team works overtime to solve a robbery - a case made doubly difficult by the fact that the prime suspect is a former petty officer who has supposedly been dead for 17 years. Eventually arrested at a Vietnam memorial, he manages to convince Gibbs of his innocence - but a discovery in the forensics lab suggests he may be guilty after all. Guest starring Peter Coyote

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Briscoe and Logan face a race against time to catch a serial killer carrying out a series of racially motivated murders. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Christopher Noth

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A wealthy man is found dead in his bed, and the team receive an anonymous tip that he was murdered. Logan and Briscoe encounter difficulties at the scene when the widow and her attorney refuse to allow an autopsy. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The body of a superintendent is found in the basement of his building, leading Logan and Briscoe to suspect his death was the result of a break-in gone wrong. However, forensic evidence points the finger of suspicion at the victim's 17-year-old son, who Dr Olivet believes is an abusive sociopath. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a woman dies in a hospital emergency room, Briscoe and Logan investigate a doctor's unorthodox method of treating cancer, which McCoy intends to prove is negligent homicide. Sam Waterston joins the cast

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman lies in a coma after being found with a bullet in her head, leaving Briscoe and Logan to investigate whether her abusive husband is responsible for shooting her. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.desc: A Japanese nightclub owner is killed while visiting New York, and a singer who once worked for the victim is arrested on suspicion of murder. While working on the case, Olivet is forced to confront memories of her sexual assault. Guest starring Laura Linney

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team flies to Israel, but receives a hostile reception from Ziva's father, who is the head of intelligence agency Mossad. As events unfold, Gibbs learns that Ziva was romantically involved with Rivkin and finds himself forced to make a tough decision. Guest starring Michael Nouri, alongside Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pablo

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony travels to North Africa on the trail of missing agent Ziva, who is thought to have been tracking down a terrorist leader called Saleem Ulman. Intent on exacting revenge for her apparent death during a flight to Somalia, he is taken hostage by militants and discovers she is still alive - only to be given a potentially catastrophic ultimatum. Starring Mark Harmon and Cote de Pablo

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and his team investigate the bizarre deaths of a marine and two of his friends at a stag party. Elsewhere, Gibbs tries to persuade Vance to allow Ziva back into the NCIS. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Warehouse 13
programme.desc: Artie and Leena stay in the Warehouse to find Brother Adrian, while Pete, Myka and Claudia try to save their loved ones from the cleric's artefacts. Mrs Frederic and Jinks visit Rome, attempting to speak with another representative of the Black Diamond Brotherhood

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Beverly Crusher sees the crew disappear around her, and discovers nobody but her remembers the missing personnel once they are gone. Racing against time as the Enterprise's crew rapidly dwindles, she tries to discover what mysterious force is taking her colleagues. Gates McFadden stars

programme.title: Star Trek: Enterprise
programme.desc: The ship is attacked by an unidentified enemy vessel, forcing the crew to work frantically to get the new phase cannons to operate. Archer is horrified to realise that no one knows Reed well enough to give him a personalised birthday gift. Scott Bakula stars

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: A member of the Q continuum is inadvertently brought aboard the Voyager, forcing Janeway to conduct a bizarre life-or-death trial. Sci-fi adventure, starring Kate Mulgrew, with a guest appearance by Jonathan Frakes

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The Big Easy's annual Red Dress Run is brought to an abrupt halt when participants discover a body on route. Luckily, the NCIS team is competing in the race, and is on hand to investigate. The victim is identified as petty officer Kelsey Weaver, who was last seen running though the city, shouting that she was being pursued by a man with a gun. CCTV footage shows no signs of Weaver's apparent assailant, but when toxicology reports reveal the dead woman had traces of a hallucinogenic drug in her system, Pride and his colleagues are drawn into the battle to stop the spread of this new narcotic substance. Naval crime drama, starring Scott Bakula

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The team searches for a link between the apparently unconnected victims of a lone gunman targeting women, while Luca assists with a homicide investigation in his neighbourhood

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Nick searches for a dragon-like monster that has killed two men in a warehouse with its fiery breath, but finds himself having to fend off the seductive advances of the creature's manipulative daughter. Fantasy drama, starring Russell Hornsby, with Danielle Panabaker

programme.desc: Detectives discover a shocking plot while looking into the death of a loving mother
